txt.en: Crack open the rock that you picked up
'That stone is too small to hold a geode of any value, my friend.'
'Would you want to carry such a heavy rock throughout Gundabad?!'
'Ah, you have a keen eye, my friend!'
A beautiful geode was hidden inside!
Various rocks can be found next to Bráthi at Zidir-nesad.\n\nYou should choose the correct rock.
A beautiful geode was hidden inside!
Bráthi can be found at Zidir-nesad, The Steepset.\n\nYou should show the geode to Bráthi.

'Ah, you have done well! I can see your skills and keen eyes have only improved since last we met. I believe you are ready then.

<rgb=#00FF00>'Throughout Gundabad you will find many round rocks that contain geodes within. I recommend searching for the following stones: granite, basalt, rhyolite, limestone, and sandstone.</rgb>

'I ask of you to search and collect them when you are able and return with what you find. I will make your endeavours worth your while too, as I have much to trade for such exquisite geodes.

'Good hunting, [placeholder]!'
Test your prospecting skills and choose the correct rock
Various rocks can be found next to Bráthi at Zidir-nesad.\n\nYou should pick up the correct rock.

'Greetings again, skilled [placeholder]. I have come to Gundabad in search of rare geodes. You have a keen eye. Perhaps you wish to assist me in the search for geodes?\n\n'Good! There is much of Gundabad to search! Before you begin searching Gundabad for these prized stones, I would first like you to show me what you know of geodes. Next to me there are three rocks. I would like you to pick out the stone with a geode inside. When you have picked up the correct stone, you will need to crack it open to reveal the geode within.'
Bráthi the master prospector is searching for precious geodes in Gundabad.
You should crack open the rock that you picked up.
Crack open the rock that you picked up
